You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this grid and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your grid first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the grids to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short grid description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else. This is your grid:
X ▢ ▢ ▢ X
X X ▢ X X
X ▢ X ▢ X
X ▢ ▢ ▢ X
X ▢ ▢ ▢ X

DESCRIPTION: The grid is a 5x5 matrix with 'X' and '▢' symbols. The first row has 'X' at the first and last positions, with '▢' in between. The second row has 'X' at the first, second, fourth, and fifth positions, with a '▢' in the middle. The third row has 'X' at the first, third, and last positions, with '▢' in the second and fourth positions. The fourth row is identical to the first row, with 'X' at the first and last positions, and '▢' in between. The fifth row has 'X' at the first and last positions, with '▢' in between.
